original_title: Gogol Bordello: Live from Axis Mundi
overview: A full 15-track live set recorded over two nights in NYC at Irving Plaza.  Setlist: Ultimate, Sally, Not A Crime, Dogs Were Barking, Wonderlust King, Mishto, Forces Of Victory, Tribal Connection, 60 Revolutions, Start Wearing Purple, Think Locally - Fuck Globally, Punk Rock Parranda, Illumination, Baro Foro
title: Gogol Bordello: Live from Axis Mundi
